akn:section.akn:heading: Applicability of administrative provisions of subchapter I

akn:content.akn:p: § 1642o. Applicability of administrative provisions of subchapter I To the extent they are not inconsistent with the provisions of this subchapter, the following provisions of subchapter I shall be applicable to this subchapter: Subsections (b), (c), (d), (e), (h), and (j) of section 1623 of this title; subsections (c), (d), (e), and (f) of section 1626 of this title. (Mar. 10, 1950, ch. 54, title IV, § 416, as added Pub. L. 85–604, § 1, Aug. 8, 1958, 72 Stat. 530.)
